title: ARMORED CORE™: VERDICT DAY™
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Korean, Chinese.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  To Secure Peace You Must Prepare for War. Command a squadron of fully customized Armored Core Units in a dystopian future ravaged by war and stripped of its natural resources; The last remaining resources needed for the survival of your faction are scavenged and bitterly fought for in the No Man’s Land, a bleak landscape that offers little hope for survival. Enlist into one of the various in-game factions and strategically adapt your weapon systems to wrestle control of territories away from other players and establish a much needed peace. A heavy trigger finger, innovative customization and tactical teamwork will be all that stand between survival and total annihilation in ARMORED CORE: VERDICT DAY.

contentRating.label: T (Teen)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: ACVD Alternate Music Set
childDownloads.description: This set of music tracks can be set to play during story missions. Faction music on the World menu can also be altered, for a total of 13 customizable tracks. Go to the Workshop menu to change the music. This content requires the 1.02 Title Update.

childDownloads.title: Armored Core V COMPATIBILITY PACK
childDownloads.description: Prepare for Doomsday.  Download this free pack to allow online interaction with other players who have purchased the Modelers Pack.

childDownloads.title: Armored Core V Parts Pack 1
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Wage fierce battles for control of territories using the most powerful weapons of war: Armored Core!  The Recon Pack features 173 parts that can be unlocked earlier than normal. The player will gain level-locked parts that can be used early on to gain an upper hand in battle. These same parts can be purchased within the game through normal progression. Download today and let the battle begin!  Note: If the same part is already owned, the level-locked parts will not be added into the player inventory.

childDownloads.title: Armored Core V Parts Pack 2
childDownloads.description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Wage fierce battles for control of territories using the most powerful weapons of war: Armored Core!   The Heavy Assault Pack features 171 parts that can be unlocked earlier than normal. The player will gain level-locked parts that can be used early on to gain an upper hand in battle. These same parts can be purchased within the game through normal progression. Download today and let the battle begin!  Note: If the same part is already owned, the level-locked parts will not be added into the player inventory.

childDownloads.title: Compatibility Pack 1
childDownloads.description: This compatibility pack makes players compatible with the latest downloadable content.  This pack is required for online play.  Please restart game after downloading. ※Please refer to the official website for details. http://www.armoredcoregame.com/

childDownloads.title: CPU Voice 1
childDownloads.description: Contains CPU voices styled after Maggy.  A normal voice and a computerized voice are included.  *Caution* - Labeled as CPU Voice Type 6 and 7 in-game. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: CPU Voice 2
childDownloads.description: Contains CPU voices styled after Fatman.  A normal voice and a computerized voice are included.  *Caution* - Labeled as CPU Voice Type 8 and 9 in-game. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: CPU Voice 3
childDownloads.description: Contains CPU voices styled after Reaper Squad Commander J.  A normal voice and a computerized voice are included.  *Caution* - Labeled as CPU Voice Type 10 and 11 in-game. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: CPU Voice 4
childDownloads.description: Contains CPU voices styled after The Foundation Man.  A normal voice and a computerized voice are included.  *Caution* - Labeled as CPU Voice Type 12 and 13 in-game. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: CPU Voice Complete Set 1
childDownloads.description: Contains CPU voices styled after 4 characters from the story missions.  All voices from CPU Voice 1-4 are included.  *Caution* - Labeled as CPU Voice Type 6 to 13 in-game. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: Parts Unlock Complete Set
childDownloads.description: Unlock all parts from Parts Unlock Sets 1, 2 and 3. (194 parts) *Caution* - These parts can be acquired through regular game progress. - This set only unlocks parts newly added to ACVD. Parts downloaded for ACV must be acquired separately.

childDownloads.title: Parts Unlock Set 1
childDownloads.description: Unlock 65 new parts suitable for close-range combat for immediate use. *Caution* - These parts can be acquired through regular game progress. - This set only unlocks parts newly added to ACVD. Parts downloaded for ACV must be acquired separately.

childDownloads.title: Parts Unlock Set 2
childDownloads.description: Unlock 65 new parts suitable for mid-range combat for immediate use. *Caution* - These parts can be acquired through regular game progress. - This set only unlocks parts newly added to ACVD. Parts downloaded for ACV must be acquired separately.

childDownloads.title: Parts Unlock Set 3
childDownloads.description: Unlock 64 new parts suitable for long-range combat for immediate use. *Caution* - These parts can be acquired through regular game progress. - This set only unlocks parts newly added to ACVD. Parts downloaded for ACV must be acquired separately.

childDownloads.title: Pilot 10
childDownloads.description: Customize your pilot to look like an SD N-WGIX/v. Pilot ejects from your AC when it is destroyed in online team battles.  *Caution* - If the player owning the data leaves the team, that team can no longer set this pilot model. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: Pilot 5
childDownloads.description: Customize your pilot to look like a UAV. Pilot ejects from your AC when it is destroyed in online team battles.  *Caution* - If the player owning the data leaves the team, that team can no longer set this pilot model. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.description: Customize your pilot to look like a container. Pilot ejects from your AC when it is destroyed in online team battles.  *Caution* - If the player owning the data leaves the team, that team can no longer set this pilot model. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: Pilot 7

childDownloads.description: Customize your pilot to look like a vehicle. Pilot ejects from your AC when it is destroyed in online team battles.  *Caution* - If the player owning the data leaves the team, that team can no longer set this pilot model. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: Pilot 9
childDownloads.description: Customize your pilot to look like an SD Maggy's AC. Pilot ejects from your AC when it is destroyed in online team battles.  *Caution* - If the player owning the data leaves the team, that team can no longer set this pilot model. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: Pilot Complete Set 2
childDownloads.description: Customize the look of your pilot with all sets 5-10.  Pilot ejects from your AC when destroyed in online team battles.  *Caution* - If the player owning the data leaves the team, that team can no longer set these pilot models. - Compatibility pack is required.

childDownloads.title: Repainted Parts  Complete Set
childDownloads.description: Contains altered designs for all parts from repainted parts sets in Armored Core: Verdict Day.  *Caution* - Parts perform the same as those in-game. - Only contains parts newly added to ACVD.  Parts downloaded for ACV must be acquired separately. - Compatibility pack is required.
